name: A Santa’s Foot Spa Salon - Little Doctor Saves the Christmas Presents 2015
name_original: A Santa’s Foot Spa Salon - Little Doctor Saves the Christmas Presents 2015
description:
Santa really needs your help! After running around all over the North Pole with the reindeers to gather up everyone’s favourite present, he’s exhausted and his feet hurt, he needs your special care. Help him to save Christmas!

Poor Santa, lets make him feel better, that’s down to you Little Doctor! Take him to the Foot Spa Salon and settle him in a comfy chair with his feet up and, oh dear! what a big hurt mess Santa’s feet are in!

You know what to do, wash his tired feet with your water spray and sooth the hurt with your healing sponge. Use the foot sponge to tackle all the nasty germs and cure his grazes. After a lovely frothy wash with the soap bar, be gentle when it comes to the pine needles and tweezers, just shake your device and hey presto..all gone.

Santa is starting to feel better, once you have done his feet, back and front, he will be as good as new and on time for his Special Festive Deliveries.

Well done little Foot Doctor, you just saved Christmas!
